stimulusHtml: This method does not always work as intended. Which of the following changes can be made so that the code segment works as intended?

features.html:
Consider the following method, which is intended to return the maximum integer value contained in ranges.

 

/** Precondition: ranges contains at least one element. */
public int findMaxValue(int[] ranges)
{
   int max = 0;               // line 4
   for (int value : ranges)
   {
      if (value > max)        // line 7
      {
         max = value;         // line 9
      }
   }
   return max;
}

choicesHtml: Changing line 4 to int max = ranges[0];
Changing line 4 to int max = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
